column5: Hey all,I posted this in strictly fishing....didn't get any hits so I thought I might try here since about 200 yards of lake is in CanadaA buddy of mine has a family cabin on lake metigoshe in N. Dakota. I have been up there in years past, and we are headed up there in about a month. We mostly fish for northern, but I wanna get some eyes while I'm there. Does anyone fish this lake have any advice?? Is the ice out yet?
The lake is noted for Northern, Walleye and Perch.....
